reviews.review: 经典游戏，很好玩，就是人太少了
играл в кс соурс еще в 2006 году примерно так.

Tengo todo el derecho de opinar sobre este videojuego ya que obtengo con mas de 850h, a si que aca esta mi reseña.
Me atrevo a decir que es unos de los mejores counter, ya que es como remasterización del 1.6. Tod esta muy bien nivelado.
Listo, el mejor juego lejos
Great game. Classical FPS game with amazing effects.
basically just old counterstrike with a lot of custom gamemodes due to source engine

I like counter strike source better than global offensive, why? Because it has way nicer community, and also most of my friends don't have a pc that can run global offensive, but can run source, so we can play together and have fun! I also like the gameplay better, but that's just an opinion. Also M249 go brrrrrrrr
css吧什么都好，就是会被大佬锤
Скажи нет CS:GO играй 1.6 и css
It's counter strike, if you dont play, you are scrub.
Это наверное самая лучшая игра серии "Counter-Strike". НИКАКИХ ЧИТЕРОВ, НИКАКИХ АГРО-ШКОЛОЛО. Благодарим VALVE за эту замечательную игру.
童年回忆，人机也挺厉害
самая лучшая часть из всей серии кс

В этой игре без разницы , умеете вы играть или нет...
Всегда будете стрелять вразброс с мки и убивать в голову
Cs é Cs né pai tá ligado!

This is definately one of the games in my top 10 games list. I do not play alot anymore due to i am now 24 years old. I used to play alot of videogames when i was 10yrs to i was 17yrs. I felt the need to come back and try this game some more now that i havent played it for several years. I really much enjoied the servers with jailbreak, bunnyhopping, somekind of level up system on surf maps with team deatch match and zombie. 10/10

I played CSS back when RS2 and Vent were still a thing, now during the great 2020 pandemic I'm trying to feel some nostalgia from my teen gamer dayz and this just hits the spot. Plus I'm stuck inside not trying to contract the "china virus".

Just got back on Steam it's been since like 2011. Whats new around here?
better than cs:go if u play that and didnt play this ur not a true og
CS:GO Uzman botlar=Source normal botlar ama eskilerden diye oynanır nostaljik
Good, semi old-fashioned CS. Less noisy than CS:GO.

И так если ты читаешь это значит я купил ксс 
Я фанат серии игр Counter-Strike. И ради этого я купил все части игры. Здесь игровое комьюнити отличное ну на серверах которые я нашел таких как дети 90-х и мясорубка
в этой контре сложная стрельба из всех частей,для новичков будет трудновато освоиться,да и комьюнити уже старое-не советую брать по фулл прайсу ,только по скидки
Как контент для Garry's Mod'a самое то.
机器人比我强，强太多太多了
muy buen juego, te cagas de risa con todo y por lo menos me toco gente buena onda...
there's a reason all competitive surf happens on CSS, the source engine physics are immaculate and this game was created with community involvement in mind
you cant not like a classic
For me this game looks like mix of CS 1.6 and CS:GO, its better by the graphic but not better than 1.6 CS
It is a very good game i highly recomend it. it is very fun with friends and my avarage pc can run it at 60-100 fps but csgo plays at 2-3 fps so i highly recomend it buy it now
this is great but you can't find a regular match that easy
Yea this is my favorite game and I love to play.
